{"id":542235631,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1629604560,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/542235631/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"15.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int nR) {\n        if(nR==1)return s;\n        map<int,string>mp;\n        int cur=0,dir=1;\n        for(auto& i:s){\n            cur+=dir;\n            mp[cur].push_back(i);\n            if(cur==1)dir=1;\n            else if(cur==nR)dir=-1;\n        }        \n        string res=\"\";\n        for(auto& i:mp)res+=i.second;\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
